summary.para: Enables access to the End-User Designer form which allows a Scheduler report to be edited by end-users.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraScheduler.Reporting.UI.SchedulerReportDesignTool.#ctor(DevExpress.XtraScheduler.Reporting.XtraSchedulerReport)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the SchedulerReportDesignTool class for the specified report.

member.param: A instance representing the report for which the End-User Designer should be invoked.
